txt.en: Ingold can be found at the North-gate of the Rammas.\n\nYou should speak with Ingold.
'You have done much to assist me at the North-gate. I thank you for your efforts, [placeholder].'
Siege equipment can be found in the northern section of Pelennor Fields.\n\nYou should sabotage siege equipment.

'Upon the parapet of the North-gate I have espied Orcs erecting machines of war. We must sabotage this equipment to delay their advances.\n\n'Time needs to be on our side as we wait for the Rohirrim to aid in our defence. I call upon you again to brave the eastern fields and destroy their siege equipment.'
Ingold has seen the erection of siege machines by Sauron's forces. He hopes that by sabotaging this equipment it will delay the enemy as they prepare for war.
